overview: California. It's rarely paradise. And there's always trouble in it. Jon Dough makes his directorial debut in a movie about a beautiful blonde who comes to Hollywood to be an aerobics trainer, only to be dogged by a troubled sister and a checkered past. Join lovely blonde Laura Palmer, the stunning Stacy Valentine, hot little minx Stephanie Swift and our nasty Monique DeMoan in a black comedy about baggage that just won't be left behind. From a director who just won't be ignored.
tagline: The new film from director Jon Dough
title: In Cold Sweat
